ignoredroles.role_now_not_ignored: %role% will not be ignored from gaining xp

levels.level_to_take_must_be_positive: Levels to take must be a positive number

settings.notification_type_dm_description: Send the level up message via direct messages

settings.role_type_stacked: Users will now have stacked roles and their previous roles will not be removed
settings.role_type_single: Users will now have single roles and their previous roles will be removed
settings.multiplier_set: This guild now has a **%multiplier%x** multiplier assigned

xp.xp_to_take_must_be_positive: Xp to take must be a positive number
